LanguageData.Norballo_Shirt.label: Mundane Shirt
LanguageData.Norballo_Shirt.description: A very mundane shirt. Slightly warmer than most base clothing.
LanguageData.MedievalArmor_Gambeson.label: Gambeson
LanguageData.MedievalArmor_Gambeson.description: Also known as an aketon, padded jack, or arming doublet, this padded defensive jacket provides decent protection. It is meant to be paired with a mail hauberk or plate armor.
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Shirt_Tunic.label: Medieval tunic
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Shirt_Tunic.description: Medieval era shirt, stitched together with clearly visible leather laces.
LanguageData.Apparel_BasicShirt.label: T-Shirt
LanguageData.Apparel_BasicShirt.description: A simple piece of clothing worn on the body with short sleeves.
LanguageData.Apparel_CollarShirt.label: Button-down Shirt
LanguageData.Apparel_CollarShirt.description: A nice looking collared shirt with buttons in front.
LanguageData.Apparello_Urbulence.label: Urban Shirt
LanguageData.Apparello_Urbulence.description: All the punks felt lucky wearing these.
LanguageData.Marine_TShirt.label: Marine Shirt
LanguageData.Marine_TShirt.description: A basic military T-shirt intended for marines.
LanguageData.Apparello_Tunic.label: Tunic
LanguageData.Apparello_Tunic.description: A very sleek and skillfully crafted full body suit capable of protecting the wearer from formidable threats.
LanguageData.Apparel_Scrubs.label: Scrubs
